Others: Javier Baez surprised his Detroit Tigers teammates when he walked into the Progressive Field clubhouse on Monday before Game 2 of the ALDS in Cleveland.
Baez, 31, has been on the injured list since Aug. 23 with lumbar spine and hip inflammation. He had hip surgery and is out for the season.
Detroit Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said Baez will be in Detroit for Game 3.
Everybody but Tarik Skubal and Reese Olson will be available for the Tigers in Game 3.
